nodes.text: The Scar was the name given to a canyon that split the icy surface of the planet Belsavis between the Power Center cavern to the west and the Tomb to the east. The Scar was formed by the heat from the Burning Wound, a lava rift that lay in the center of the canyon; the Scar was unable to expand further in the east or west directions due to the presence of rock, but the heat from the Wound gradually melted the ice to the north and south, extending the Scar. When the Esh-kha were unleashed from imprisonment during the invasion of Belsavis during the Galactic War, they quickly overtook the Scar.

The Scar is a subregion of the planet Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, linking the Ancient Prison Caverns and the Tomb. The Scar is designed to have Imperial players on the northern path and Republic players on the southern path on the opposite side of the Wound, though the Wound is passable along the rock ledges on its sides.
